summary: 2013 ALTIMA WITH 86,000 MILES.  THE LOWER REAR PASSENGER CONTROL ARM CRACKED AND BROKE OFF THE MOUNT.  THIS HAPPENED WHILE DRIVING ~30MPH.  THIS HAPPENED WHILE DRIVING STRAIGHT.  THE REAR END OF THE CAR SWERVED PRETTY SEVERELY DURING THE INCIDENT.  I HAD THREE KIDS IN THE BACK SPEED SO THIS IS A HUGE SAFETY ISSUE.  IF THIS HAPPENED AT HIGHER HIGHWAY SPEEDS IT'S QUITE A DANGEROUS SITUATION.  I WAS LUCKY THIS HAPPENED AT SLOW SPEEDS AS THIS IS A MOSTLY HIGHWAY CAR.
